entry.title: RubyKaigi 2023 After Party sponsored by STORES
entry.content:
RubyKaigi 2023 After Party

We will be hosting an after-party for all RubyKaigi 2023 attendees. At the venue, there will be food and an all-you-can-drink beverage selection provided. Please enjoy networking and connecting with others who use or develop Ruby!

â€» This is the page for the RubyKaigi 2023 after-party. To register for RubyKaigi 2023, please sign up through the following registration page.

https://ti.to/rubykaigi/2023

Event Details

Date and Time: May 13th, 2023 (Saturday) 18:00 - 20:00 (Registration starts at 17:45)
Venue: Matsumoto Tsunagu Yokocho https://matsumoto-yokocho.jp/
Address: 1-3-21 Fukashi, Matsumoto City, Nagano Prefecture, 390-0815, Japan
Participation Fee: Free

Age Verification

While we welcome minors, weâ€™re instructed from the venue to do age verification in order to provide alcohol. Please make sure that you respond to the question asking youâ€™re at least 20 years old. Weâ€™ll provide minors a wristband to indicate who should not have alcoholic drinks.

For Ruby Committers, Speakers, Staff

Ruby core team members, RubyKaigi 2023 speakers and staff are invited to attend without registration! Just bring your Speaker/Committer/Staff badge to the party.

Important notes

  • The event is free to attend, but we kindly ask that you register in advance so that we can understand the number of participants.
  • If you are unable to attend, please take the time to cancel your registration.
  • We may compile and share details about the after-party in a blog post at a later date.
  • If your purpose for attending is deemed inappropriate, the event organizers reserve the right to cancel your participation.
  • Please act in accordance with the RubyKaigi Policies while inside the venue, and cooperate to ensure all participants can enjoy the event.
  • If you have any concerns or issues, please contact us through the "Inquiries about the Event" section on the event page.

RubyKaigi 2023 After Party
